<form
  id="webAuthnSupportForm"
  method="post"
>
  <input
    type="hidden"
    name="webAuthnSupport"
    id="webAuthnSupport"
  />
  <button
    type="hidden"
    data-skcomponent="skbutton"
    data-skbuttontype="form-submit"
    class="hidden-button"
    data-skbuttonvalue="submit"
    data-skform="webAuthnSupportForm"
    id="webAuthnSupportSubmitBtn"
  ></button>
</form>
